name: Haunted House Tycoon
description:
You are the owner of some old ruins. Hire monsters and spook out the neighbors! create the ultimate haunted house!

A bit about this project: Hi, I am a new developer that went round looking for game jams to compete in. I found the "Novices Now!" Jam and decided to join! I only had 3 days to create this game and had a lot of fun doing so.

Edit: Polished it much more now, icons to make it look crisper.
